title: Web Development Mentor
bullets: Mentor students in full-stack web development as they work through cutting edge curriculum
Provide assistance by pair programming, debugging issues, and answering technical questions

title: Full-stack Developer
bullets: Helped design and build a new portal for a subset of users
Transitioned from legacy front-end tech stack to facilitate a need for complex front-end applications

title: Front-end Developer
bullets: Part of the front-end development team designing and building UI for the customer portal
UI / UX design for a platform upgrade
